channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rare Cosmic Event May Be First-Ever ‘Superkilonova,’ Scientists Say
item.description: Astronomers have spotted AT2025ulz, a rare dual explosion — a supernova and a kilonova — that may be the first-ever observed “superkilonova.”

item.title: Could A2RL Autonomous Car Racing Be More Fun Than Formula One Now?
item.description: Can autonomous car racing challenge F1? A2RL’s 150mph AI battles are getting closer to human drivers, bolder, and more exciting, although not without ...

item.title: NASA’s Hubble Sees Baby Planets Colliding Around A Famous Star
item.description: NASA’s Hubble Space Telescope has captured infant planets colliding around Fomalhaut, one of the brightest stars in the night sky.

item.title: Closing 2025 Focused On CES 2026 Accessibility And Auditory Health
item.description: A year-end reflection on CES 2026, exploring accessibility, auditory health, inclusive experiences, and what meaningful, low-effort experiences should...

item.title: Here’s The Exact Time The ‘Stranger Things’ Series Finale Streams On Netflix (And How Long It Is)
item.description: This is when the very last episode of Stranger Things lands on Netflix.

item.title: Which kind of ‘enough’?
